goal.ch: 為提昇學習效果，培養學生專業技能與實作經驗，使學生畢業後更能符合產業界需求，本系開設相關產業實習課程。
goal.en: To enhance learning outcomes and develop students‘ professional skills and practical experience, making them better suited to meet industry needs after graduation, our department offers relevant industry internship courses.

outline.ch:
暑期專業實習：由大二或大三學生參與，於每年七月初至九月初之暑假期間在校外實習單位進行。
1實習單位與內容需經本系「教學與課程委員會」認定。
2. 本系得安排相關公司、法人機構，並規劃相應實習內容，於適當時間公佈、說明，並協助學生與實習單位媒合。
3. 學生亦可自行尋找經政府登記核准，且具有良好制度及信譽，符合機械相關專業領域之企業、研究機構作為實習單位，並於實習開始前提交「實習規劃書」，經本系「教學與課程委員會」審核通過後，始得以修習相關實習課程。
(1) 「實習規劃書」提交時程：「專業實習 I」與「專業實習 II」於每年六月十五日前。
(2) 「實習規劃書」內容：需包括實習單位基本資料，實習起迄日期，各週實習內容規劃，實習單位同意書等。
outline.en:
Summer Professional Internship: Participated by second or third-year students, conducted at external internship units from early July to early September each year.
Internship units and content must be approved by the department‘s ‘Teaching and Curriculum Committee.‘
The department may arrange relevant companies and organizations, plan corresponding internship content, announce and explain details at an appropriate time, and assist in matching students with internship units.
Students may also independently find government-registered and approved enterprises or research institutions with good systems and reputations in mechanical-related professional fields as their internship units. Before starting the internship, students must submit an ‘Internship Plan,‘ which must be approved by the department‘s ‘Teaching and Curriculum Committee‘ before enrolling in related internship courses.
(1) ‘Internship Plan‘ submission timeline: For ‘Professional Internship I‘ and ‘Professional Internship II,‘ plans must be submitted by June 15 each year.
(2) ‘Internship Plan‘ content: Must include basic information about the internship unit, internship start and end dates, weekly internship content plans, and the internship unit‘s consent letter.

gradMethod.ch: 學生於暑假期間之實習時數達到 320小時以上 (以每週五日，每天八小時，二個月之實習時數計)。 實習表現成績計算以實習單位主管考核成績佔 70％，學校輔導老師考核成績佔30％，共 同核計之。評分項目與比重分別如下： 1. 實習工作週報－實習單位主管考核項目I (40％) 學生於實習過程中須每週撰寫工作報告，請每週末交給實習單位主管評量，並請人事部或單位主管保留作為期末成績評量依據。 2. 實習表現－實習單位主管考核項目II (30％) 實習單位主管就學生於實習期間之出缺勤與同事互動狀況予以考核評分。 3. 實習心得報告－學校輔導老師考核 (30％) 學生需於實習結束後1個月內需繳交實習工作週報(單位主管需簽名)以及12頁以上之專業實習心得報告至輔導老師以做為考核依據。
gradMethod.en:
Students must complete over 320 hours of internship during the summer (calculated as five days a week, eight hours a day, for two months). The performance evaluation for the internship will be calculated with 70％ from the internship unit supervisor‘s assessment and 30％ from the school mentor‘s assessment. The evaluation items and their respective weights are as follows:

Internship Work Weekly Reports - Internship Unit Supervisor Assessment I (40％)
During the internship, students must write weekly work reports, which should be submitted to the internship unit supervisor at the end of each week. These reports should be retained by the HR department or unit supervisor as the basis for the final grade evaluation.

Internship Performance - Internship Unit Supervisor Assessment II (30％)
The internship unit supervisor will evaluate and score the student‘s attendance and interaction with colleagues during the internship period.

Internship Reflection Report - School Mentor Assessment (30％)
Within one month after the internship ends, students must submit their weekly work reports (signed by the unit supervisor) and a professional internship reflection report of at least 12 pages to their mentor for evaluation.
